name: LGBTQ+ Housing Protections
description: States that prohibit housing discrimination based on sexual orientation or gender identity. All housing providers that receive HUD funding cannot discriminate against an individual's sexual orientation or gender identity.

source.name: Wikipedia
source.title: LGBT rights in the United States: Discrimination protections

unspecifiedMessage: Does not factor sexual orientation or gender identity/unclear

groups.name: Prohibits housing discrimination based on sexual orientation and gender identity
Prohibits housing discrimination based on sexual orientation only
